Player History
Injured on 7/15/1968 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
Injured on 4/23/1969 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 7/23/1969 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/12/1970, off Jim Duffalo (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/30/1970, off Paul Edmondson (LA)...
Injured on 5/31/1970 with a Fractured Hip, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 4/28/1971 with a Fractured Ribs, out for 2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/3/1972, hitting .421 with 5 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 1972 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/6/1976 to a 3-year deal worth $6,000,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Baltimore on 9/23/1976...
Drove in 7 runs against California on 8/19/1977...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1977...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1978...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 2/15/1979 to a 3-year deal worth $6,100,000 per year...
Traded from Los Angeles to Houston on 1/31/1981 (Going to LA: 3B J. Mumphrey, 2B J. Orta, P J. Palmer. Going to HOU: P C. Speck, C G. Goossen, 2B D. Garcia, CF R. Craig)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Atlanta on 9/25/1981...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/8/1982 to a 1-year deal worth $810,000 per year...
Injured on 8/9/1982 with a Knocked Out Teeth, out for 2 days...
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by St. Louis in 1985...
Injured on 9/2/1986 with a Torn Ligament Elbow, out for entire career...
Injured on 5/31/1987 with a Inflamed Tricep Tendon, out for 2-3 weeks...
Injured on 7/13/1988 with a Tender Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 6/18/1989...
Injured on 5/3/1990 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 5/26/1996 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 8-9 weeks...
